VIEW BOARD LIST

Built in 1926 as one of America’s most elaborate movie palaces, the Tampa Theatre is a beloved community landmark featuring classic movies, new releases and unique experiences. Discover an array of events in Tampa today.

Film Booker (Pacific Film Resources)

Membership
Ready to join Tampa’s most exclusive club?
(Spoiler: we’re not that exclusive, but the popcorn is legendary)
Our 2,000+ members keep this 1926 movie palace alive and thriving.
Your membership helps us present 700+ films, concerts, and events each year, ensures this majestic movie palace remains accessible to all walks of life, and supports the ongoing restoration of this 99-year-old national landmark that operates 365 days a year.
Translation:
You get amazing perks while doing something meaningful for Tampa’s cultural heart.
Starting at just $50/year
, membership includes $3 off movie tickets, no online fees, FREE refills on popcorn and soda, member appreciation screenings with FREE admission and concessions, behind-the-scenes tours, exclusive member events, and year-round perks that make you feel like Tampa Theatre royalty.
Plus, you’ll finally have an answer when people ask, “What’s your favorite thing about Tampa?” that doesn’t involve beaches or Cuban sandwiches.
Check out the levels below to find your perfect fit – we’ve got a spot for every level of movie obsession.
New Members:
just click “JOIN NOW” at the bottom of the appropriate column below.
Renewing your Annual Membership?
Click here to renew an existing Tampa Theatre membership
(and thank you for your support)!
Gift Memberships:
want to give someone else a Tampa Theatre membership as a present?
Click here to purchase a Gift Membership!
Did you know?
Tampa Theatre is a part of the
Art House Visiting Members Program
; which means Tampa Theatre members get to enjoy the member ticket discount and select member perks at any other participating theatre throughout the United States (and vice versa… welcome tourists!)
VIEW
the map of art house cinemas and plan your next trip.
LOG IN TO YOUR MEMBER ACCOUNT

Built in 1926 as one of America’s most elaborate movie palaces, the Tampa Theatre is a beloved community landmark featuring classic movies, new releases and unique experiences. Discover an array of events in Tampa today.

Tampa Theatre, operated by the Tampa Theatre Foundation, hosts over 600 events each year - including first-run and classic films, concerts, and educational programs - providing an array of things to do in Tampa tonight, this weekend, or beyond.

Contact Us
Meet The Team
711 N Franklin Street
Tampa, FL 33602
To confirm the hours of operation, call the Box Office in advance of your visit at (813) 274-8286.
Weekdays: 10:00am until 30 min. after the last show of the day begins.
Weekends: 30 min. before the first show of the day until 30 min. after the last show begins.
Hours may vary on holidays and during live events.
